greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of signed triangle A064334.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..488
maple: f:= proc(n) local k; 1 + add(simplify(hypergeom([1-n+k,n-k],[-n+k],-k)),k=0..n-1) end proc:
xref: Cf. A064339 (row sums of unsigned triangle A064334).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Sep 21 2001
